import React, { useState, useContext ,useEffect} from "react"; import { ProductContext } from "../context/context"; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; export default function LoginScreen(props) { const context = useContext(ProductContext); const { loginHandler, signupHandler, loggedin } = context; const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [pass, setPass] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [cpass, setCpass] = useState(""); if(loggedin){ return } return (

Create Account

setName(event.target.value)} > setEmail(event.target.value)} > setPass(event.target.value)} > setCpass(event.target.value)} >

Welcome To Extreme-Joy

Sign-In Now!

setEmail(event.target.value)} > setPass(event.target.value)} >
); }
